text: The spotted flat lizard (Platysaurus maculatus) is a lizard in the Cordylidae family, which is native to Mozambique. The spotted flat lizard has two subspecies, P. m. maculatus and P. m. linecauda. Both were described in 1965. == See also == * Platysaurus * Cordylidae == References == == External links == * More Information on The Reptile Database Category:Platysaurus Category:Lizards of Africa Category:Endemic fauna of Mozambique Category:Fauna of Southern Africa Category:Reptiles of Mozambique Category:Reptiles described in 1965
title: Spotted flat lizard
